name: minidenticons
description: Super lightweight SVG identicon (icon avatar) generator
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.no-custom-element: cat minidenticons.min.js | sed 's/export const minidenticonSvg=.*$//' > no-custom-element.min.js
scripts.size:
printf '_%.0s' {1..40} && echo "

Without custom element:" && pnpm --silent size-no-ce && echo "With custom element:" && pnpm -silent size-ce && echo
scripts.size-no-ce:
echo "Minified brotli size:	`brotli -Zcn no-custom-element.min.js | wc -c` bytes
Minified gzip size:	`gzip -9cn no-custom-element.min.js | wc -c` bytes
"
scripts.size-ce:
echo "Minified brotli size:	`brotli -Zcn minidenticons.min.js | wc -c` bytes
Minified gzip size:	`gzip -9cn minidenticons.min.js | wc -c` bytes"
scripts.build: pnpm build-js && pnpm no-custom-element && pnpm --silent size
scripts.prepublish: pnpm build && pnpm test && git push && git push --tags
